pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using binding materials: $(item)Iron Bars$(), $(item)Ender Pearl$(), $(item)Glass Bottle$(), and $(item)End Stone$(). Requires $(will)128 demon will minimum$() and consumes $(will)64 will$().

A reagent infused with the essence of binding and entrapment. This catalyst can be combined with an $(item)Imbued Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigils/sigil_chains)Sigil of the Phantom Chain$().

pages.title: Crafting Chain
pages.text: $(bold)Step 1:$() Forge this reagent in the Hellfire Forge$(br2)$(bold)Step 2:$() Create an Alchemy Array using Arcane Ash$(br2)$(bold)Step 3:$() Right-click the reagent onto the array$(br2)$(bold)Step 4:$() Right-click an Imbued Slate onto the array to complete the transformation
